definition: a steel hand tool with small sharp teeth on some or all of its surfaces, file a formal charge against
details:
noun
- a steel hand tool with small sharp teeth on some or all of its surfaces
- office furniture consisting of a container for keeping papers in order
= synonyms: file cabinet, filing cabinet
- a set of related records kept together
= example: a set of related records kept together
= synonyms: data file
- a line of persons or things ranged one behind the other
= synonyms: single file
verb
- file a formal charge against
= synonyms: charge
- place in a container for keeping records
= synonyms: file away
- record in a public office or in a court of law
= example: record in a public office or in a court of law
= synonyms: register
- smooth with a file
= example: smooth with a file
- proceed in line
= example: proceed in line
